commenter_b: @username the uk intends on putting it's own citizens first. .to achieve this we intend to control the flow of immigration here ( not close them) the problem with the EU free movement is that the poorer member citizens prefer to go and live in the more welthiest members causing a flood in the labour market. .all other countries outside the uk have this policy
